descriptionHtml:
The Rose of Jealousy
=====================

The Sanguine Rose is a really good design, fitting the female mage character perfectly.
I always felt that the enchantment did not really fit to the rose though.

This Mod let\'s you craft the \'Rose of Jealousy\' at the forge in the daedric category. You need the \'Daedric Smithing\' perk!

=====================

The rose has different effects, depending on the enemy.

- Humans and Creatures will go mad.
- Undead flee.
- Animals become peaceful.
- Dragons are forced to land.

The staff has only very few charges and is expensive to reload.
To craft it you need dragon scales, human heart, daedra heart, briar heart and, most importantly, firewood.

=====================

Install:
-	Copy file to skyrim/Data folder manually or via mod-manager.
-	Activate file via launcher or mod-manager.

Uninstall
-	Deactivate file via launcher or mod-manager.
-	Delete file from skyrim/Data folder manually or via mod-manager.

======================

Originally, this was part of the NAEE mod:   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10329
Now as standalone by request.

Please endorse and enjoy,

Joe316
author: Joe316
